name: (retro) Interactive Music "starter" Pack
description:
100% free video game music pack. This one is very unique as it contains all the assets you need if you want to try implementing interactive music in your project. My goal was to share some assets so anyone could try and experiment with interactive music. You can obtain similar results to the iMUSE system back in the 90's.

This pack contains 7 .ogg files (150 bpm 4/4) :

2 musical themes ("Main" and "Room A" corresponding to 2 different places in your game) -  both are loopable

1 musical transition ("Main Out") you can trigger every 2 bars in order to switch the music seamlessly from Main to Room A

4 musical transitions ("RoomA_tr1",  "RoomA_tr2", "RoomA_tr3", "RoomA_tr4") you can trigger every 2 bars in order to switch the music seamlessly from Room A to Main.

It contains also 2 logic suggestions as examples (FMOD and Visionaire Studio).

Demo and tutorial in the youtube video.

If you have any questions, comments or any suggestions regarding those assets, please email me at :

contact@bertrandguegan.com 

or meet me on discord :
